rule.ID: Signed Date cannot be a future date
QDRO Date cannot be a future date

item.ID: QDRO Date cannot be a future date
Signed Date cannot be a future date

query.sfwSql: SELECT SP.PLAN_NAME ,SP.PLAN_ID,SP.PLAN_CODE FROM SGT_PLAN SP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PLAN_ID =SPA.PLAN_ID where SPA.END_DATE is null and SPA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID and SP.PLAN_CODE <> 'LIFE'
select COUNT(*) from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT as pa WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PLAN as p WITH(NOLOCK) on p.PLAN_ID=pa.PLAN_ID where pa.PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID and p.PLAN_CODE='IAP'
select PERSON_ID from sgt_person_account SPA WITH(NOLOCK) where SPA.PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID
select * from SGT_PLAN WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT SP.PLAN_NAME ,SP.PLAN_ID,SP.PLAN_CODE FROM SGT_PLAN SP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PLAN_ID =SPA.PLAN_ID where SPA.END_DATE is null and SPA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID and sp.PLAN_CODE in ('Local600','Local666','Local700','Local52')

SELECT SP.PLAN_NAME as istrPlanDesc ,SPA.*,SP.Plan_Code as istrPlanCode FROM SGT_PLAN SP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PLAN_ID =SPA.PLAN_ID where sp.PLAN_CODE <> 'LIFE' and SPA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT WHERE SPECIAL_ACCOUNT='Y' AND PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID=@PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID
SELECT pa.*,p.plan_code as istrPlanCode FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT as pa WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PLAN AS P WITH(NOLOCK) on P.PLAN_ID=PA.PLAN_ID where pa.PERSON_ID=@person_id and P.PLAN_CODE = 'MPIPP'

SELECT pa.*,p.plan_code as istrPlanCode FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT as pa WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PLAN AS P WITH(NOLOCK) on P.PLAN_ID=PA.PLAN_ID where pa.PERSON_ID=@person_id and P.PLAN_CODE <> 'LIFE' and pa.plan_id=@plan_id

SELECT pa.*,p.plan_code as istrPlanCode FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT as pa WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PLAN AS P WITH(NOLOCK) on P.PLAN_ID=PA.PLAN_ID where pa.PERSON_ID=(SELECT PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON WHERE MPI_PERSON_ID = @person_id) and P.PLAN_CODE <> 'LIFE' and pa.plan_id=@plan_id

SELECT ACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID,PER.PERSON_ID,PER.MPI_PERSON_ID,dbo.fn_GET_DECRYPTED_TEXT(PER.SSN) AS SSN FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACCT WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACCT.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID AND ACCT.PLAN_ID = 1
SELECT * FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA JOIN SGT_PLAN SP ON SP.PLAN_ID = SPA.PLAN_ID WHERE SPA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID
select PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT where PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID and PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID

SELECT ACCT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID,PER.PERSON_ID,PER.MPI_PERSON_ID,dbo.fn_GET_DECRYPTED_TEXT(PER.SSN) AS SSN FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT ACCT WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON PER WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACCT.PERSON_ID = PER.PERSON_ID AND ACCT.PLAN_ID = 1 AND PER.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID

SELECT SPA.* FROM SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPA.PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBA.PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPAC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAC.PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID WHERE SPA.STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV' AND SBA.MIN_DISTRIBUTION_FLAG <> 'Y' AND SBA.APPLICATION_STATUS_VALUE <> 'CANC' AND ISNULL(SPAC.REEMPLOYED_FLAG,'N') <> 'Y'
select PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT where PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID
SELECT SP.MPI_PERSON_ID FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPA INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP ON SPA.PERSON_ID = SP.PERSON_ID WHERE SPA.PLAN_ID = 1 AND SPA.STATUS_VALUE IN ('ACTV','INAC')

DECLARE @LASTPAYMENTDATE DATETIME DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE DATETIME
-- Get Last Payment Date SELECT TOP 1 @LASTPAYMENTDATE = SPS.PAYMENT_DATE FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE SPS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE SCHEDULE_TYPE_VALUE = 'MTLY' AND STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' ORDER BY SPS.PAYMENT_DATE DESC
-- Set next benefit payment date SET @PAYMENTDATE = DATEADD(M,1,@LASTPAYMENTDATE)
SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN (ITEM_TYPE_DIRECTION = 1 OR ALLOW_ROLLOVER_CODE_VALUE = 'RRED') AND REISSUE_ITEMS_FLAG = 'N' THEN (SPAPIT.AMOUNT * PIT.ITEM_TYPE_DIRECTION) ELSE 0 END),0.00) AS GROSS_AMOUNT FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT SPBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPBA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPAPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE PIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON PIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = SPAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR PBXR ON PBXR.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID = SPA.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID
WHERE SPBA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID AND (SELECT TOP 1 Q.STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS Q WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Q.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY Q.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) NOT IN ('CMPL', 'CNCL') AND ISNULL(SPA.RETIREE_INCR_FLAG,'N') = 'N' AND PBXR.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE <> 'LUMP' AND SPAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID IN (1,2) AND SPAPIT.START_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE AND (SPAPIT.END_DATE IS NULL OR SPAPIT.END_DATE >= @PAYMENTDATE) AND SPA.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE IN ('RTMT','DSBL') AND PBXR.PLAN_ID = @PLAN_ID

SELECT PAE.FORFEITURE_DATE FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT PA INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT_ELIGIBILITY PAE ON PA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = PAE.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN SP ON PA.PLAN_ID =SP.PLAN_ID WHERE PA.PLAN_ID=@Plan_ID AND PA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID

SELECT SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT SPBA LEFT JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA ON SPA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID=SPBA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPAS ON SPAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX ON SPBX.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID=SPA.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVP ON SCVP.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCVP.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_PLAN SP ON SP.PLAN_ID=SPBX.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCVS ON SCVS.CODE_ID = SPAS.STATUS_ID AND SCVS.CODE_VALUE = SPAS.STATUS_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL SBAD ON SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID=SPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA ON SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID=SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID WHERE (SPBA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID OR SPA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID) AND SP.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID AND (SPAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP(1) PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS Q WHERE Q.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC))

SELECT DISTINCT SBA.*, SP.MPI_PERSON_ID AS MPI_PERSON_ID, SP.FIRST_NAME, SP.LAST_NAME, SP.SSN, ISNULL(SP.VIP_FLAG, 'N') AS istrRelativeVipFlag, SP1.MPI_PERSON_ID AS SURVIVOR_MPI_ID, SO.MPI_ORG_ID, SP1.LAST_NAME SP1LAST, SP1.FIRST_NAME SP1First, SO.ORG_NAME, SPAP.MPI_PERSON_ID, SPAP.FIRST_NAME, SPAP.LAST_NAME , PL.PLAN_NAME AS istrPlanDescription , CASE WHEN SBAD.JOINT_ANNUITANT_ID IS NULL THEN rtrim(SP1.FIRST_NAME) +' '+rtrim(SP1.LAST_NAME) ELSE rtrim(SP2.FIRST_NAME) +' '+rtrim(SP2.LAST_NAME) END AS istrSurvivor , CASE WHEN SBAD.L52_SPL_ACC_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Local-52 Special Account' WHEN SBAD.L161_SPL_ACC_FLAG = 'Y' THEN 'Local-161 Special Account' ELSE '' END AS istrFunds FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PERSON_ID = SBA.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SPAP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAP.PERSON_ID = SBA.ALTERNATE_PAYEE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL SBAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPBX.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID = SBAD.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN PL ON SPBX.PLAN_ID = PL.PLAN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP1 ON SBAD.SURVIVOR_ID = SP1.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP2 ON SBAD.JOINT_ANNUITANT_ID = SP2.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION SO ON SBAD.ORGANIZATION_ID = SO.ORG_ID WHERE SP.PERSON_ID = @PersonId AND SBA.BENEFIT_TYPE_VALUE = 'RTMT' AND PL.PLAN_NAME = @PlanName
select * from SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT as pa WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PLAN as p WITH(NOLOCK) on p.PLAN_ID=pa.PLAN_ID where pa.PERSON_ID=@PERSON_ID
SELECT TRACKING_ID FROM SGS_COR_TRACKING WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE TEMPLATE_ID IN(175, 164,176) AND PERSON_ID = @PersonId

SELECT SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, SPAS.STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION SO WITH(NOLOCK) ON SO.ORG_ID = SPA.ORG_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_DIRECTIVES PDS WITH(NOLOCK) ON PDS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PDS.PAYMENT_DIRECTIVES_ID = (SELECT Max(PAYMENT_DIRECTIVES_ID) FROM SGT_PAYMENT_DIRECTIVES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND IS_DELETED = 'N' AND MORE_INFORMATION IS NOT NULL) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL SBAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL SBAC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBAPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAPL.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER SBCH WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBCH.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID = SBAC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT SPBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPBA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = SPBA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPP.PERSON_ID = CASE WHEN SPAT.PERSON_ID IS NULL THEN SPAT.BENEFECIARY_OF_PERSON_ID ELSE SPAT.PERSON_ID END LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_DRO_BENEFIT_DETAILS SQAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SQAD.DRO_BENEFIT_ID = SPA.DRO_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_QDRO_CALCULATION_DETAIL SQAC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SQAC.QDRO_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.DRO_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_DRO_APPLICATION SQAPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON SQAPL.DRO_APPLICATION_ID = SQAD.DRO_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_QDRO_CALCULATION_HEADER SQCH WITH(NOLOCK) ON SQCH.QDRO_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID = SQAC.QDRO_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR PLNBXR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLNBXR.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID = SPA.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID = PLNBXR.PLAN_ID WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND sp.person_id = @PersonId AND pln.plan_id = @PlanId AND SBAPL.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = @BenefitApplicationId AND SPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID = @BenefitApplicationDetailId AND spa.benefit_account_type_value = 'RTMT' ORDER BY RETIREE_INCR_FLAG, ONETIME_PAYMENT_FLAG, PLN.PLAN_ID, SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID

SELECT PA.QDRO_LEGAL_REVIEW_REQUIRED, QDRO_REVIEW_COMPLETED_DATE FROM SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT AS PA WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PLAN AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PLAN_ID = PA.PLAN_ID WHERE PA.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND P.PLAN_ID IN( @PLAN_ID)

SELECT SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, SPAS.STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL SBAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL SBAC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBAPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAPL.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER SBCH WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBCH.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID = SBAC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT SPBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPBA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = SPBA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPP.PERSON_ID = CASE WHEN SPAT.PERSON_ID IS NULL THEN SPAT.BENEFECIARY_OF_PERSON_ID ELSE SPAT.PERSON_ID END LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR PLNBXR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLNBXR.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID = SPA.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID = PLNBXR.PLAN_ID WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND sp.PERSON_ID = @PersonId AND pln.plan_id = @PlanId AND spa.benefit_account_type_value like 'RTMT' AND spas.status_value like 'RECV'

SELECT SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, SPAS.STATUS_VALUE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT SPA WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PERSON_ID = SPA.PERSON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS SPAS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL SBAD WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL SBAC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID = SPA.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_DETAIL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION SBAPL WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAPL.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = SBAD.BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER SBCH WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBCH.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID = SBAC.BENEFIT_CALCULATION_HEADER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT SPBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPBA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SPAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAT.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = SPBA.PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON SPP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPP.PERSON_ID = CASE WHEN SPAT.PERSON_ID IS NULL THEN SPAT.BENEFECIARY_OF_PERSON_ID ELSE SPAT.PERSON_ID END LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR PLNBXR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLNBXR.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID = SPA.PLAN_BENEFIT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PLAN PLN WITH(NOLOCK) ON PLN.PLAN_ID = PLNBXR.PLAN_ID WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = SPA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC) AND sp.PERSON_ID = @PersonId AND pln.plan_id = @PlanId AND spa.benefit_account_type_value like 'RTMT' AND spas.status_value not in('CNCL', 'CMPL')
SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CASE_INSTANCE_ID = @Case_Instance_Id
SELECT * FROM SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION_CHECKLIST WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID = @BENEFIT_APPLICATION_ID
select PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID from SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT where PERSON_ID=@PersonId AND BENEFIT_APPLICATION_DETAIL_ID=@BenfitApplicationDetailId order by PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID desc
UPDATE SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SET CREATED_BY = @CREATED_BY WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID
SELECT ROLE_ID FROM SGS_ROLES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ROLE_DESCRIPTION = @ROLE_DESCRIPTION

UPDATE SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT SET APPLICATION_FORM_SENT = 'N', ELECTION_PACKET_RECEIVED = 'N', ELECTION_PACKET_SENT = 'N', QDRO_LEGAL_REVIEW_REQUIRED = 'N', SIGNED_APPLICATION_FORN_RECEIVED_DATE = NULL, QDRO_REVIEW_COMPLETED_DATE = NULL WHERE PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID = @PERSON_ACCOUNT_ID
